name: Strategyblockslight
body:
# StrategyBlocksLight

## Welcome to the Homepage for the StrategyBlocks lightweight front-end.

> Warning: This library is still a work in progress 

This library is intended to be available for free for anyone who wants to develop their own client for [StrategyBlocks](http://www.strategyblocks.com). This library is being used as the backbone for the IPhone app, and is being actively developed for use in a new HTML5 StrategyBlocks client.

To use this library effectively, you will need to [create a StrategyBlocks account](https://app.strategyblocks.com/register.html) if you don't already have one. 

Once you have an account, check out some of the html files in the /tests folder and see some basic examples for how to use it. There's no documentation yet, but feel free to post any problems/questions under the *issues* section of the repository and I'll get back to you asap.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
